div.p: 9ff. ‘One talent of silver from your brother Thonius. I have recovered only 4 pounds from the launderer; the rest are with him. I got the remnants from the carpenter: from his debt of 2000 drachmae I got 1000 on account. Get from Apion one sack of hair (?) and another of tow. I have obtained nothing from anyone in Apion’s house. Of the bronze …,’
